name: Shrugger the Indifferent
response: Shrugger the Indifferent couldn’t care less about the world’s drama—Insurance? Pharma? Crypto? Nah, it’s all good, no biggie. Just a shrug and a scratch for Shrugger. It’s not that they’re indifferent in a bad way; they’re more like the embodiment of modern-day neutrality, living proof that you can exist without giving two hoots about anything. If you ask them their opinion on pretty much anything, they’ll just raise an eyebrow, tilt their head, and say, “Meh.” Basically, Shrugger is the troll version of “I see, but I’m not seeing it.” Keep it chill, keep it simple—that’s Shrugger’s vibe.
